description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              You may not have heard of Spirax Sarco Engineering, but your life has almost certainly been influenced by the work we do. Everything you come across has been touched in one way or another by our products in virtually every area of industry, such as food, beverages, healthcare and pharmaceuticals.
              

              We have for the 2nd year running, been voted one of Britain’s most admired companies but it’s our people that makes us special. We encourage innovation and ingenuity, support each other and are passionate about recruiting the best possible talent into our business.
              

              Our sales people provide professional customer service and develop long-lasting relationships and partnerships with our customers by living our core values of respect, accountability, passion, integrity and delivery, in our daily activities selling our company’s products and services.
              

              We are looking for a Technical Sales Engineer to join our Hanoi team to represent Spirax Sarco Vietnam Company Ltd as the market leader in steam system design, and in providing expertise, solutions and sustainability for our customers.
              



              Key Responsibilities
              
              •	Work in a team environment of a multinational company
              
              •	Building long term sustainable relationships with our customers
              
              •	Offer solutions to our existing customers by recommend and quoting steam system improvements and upgrades
              
              •	Identify new customers and take actions to develop relationships
              
              •	Desire to learn and increase knowledge
              
              •	Comply with the Spirax Sarco Vietnam Company Ltd Workplace Safety, Environmental, Legal, and Anti Bribery and Corruption policies & standards
              
              •	Achieve orders, sales and profit targets.
              
              •	Undertake a business plan for your sales area in accordance with set and agreed KPIs and Company standards
              
              •	Complete and submit reports on KPI’s

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Degree in engineering, science or business
              
              Working in a team environment of a multinational company
              
              Positive attitude, strong interpersonal skills and customer oriented
              
              Direct sales experience in business-to-business engineering solution-selling
              
              Proficiency in spoken and written English
              
              Skilled in Microsoft Office
              
              Passion for learning
              
              Male or female is acceptable.
